 33namespace vsip

 42
 43
 44/// Specialized If-Then-Else class for Choose_asses.  Chooses either
 45/// IfType::type or ElseType::type based on boolean predicate.  Also
 46/// track reason_type.
 47
 48template <bool     Predicate,
 49	  typename IfType,
 50	  typename ElseType>
 51struct ITE_type_reason;
 52
 53template <typename IfType,
 54	  typename ElseType>
 55struct ITE_type_reason<true, IfType, ElseType>
 56{
 57  typedef typename IfType::type        type;
 58  typedef typename IfType::reason_type reason_type;
 59};
 60
 61template <typename IfType,
 62	  typename ElseType>
 63struct ITE_type_reason<false, IfType, ElseType>
 64{
 65  typedef typename ElseType::type        type;
 66  typedef typename ElseType::reason_type reason_type;
 67};
 68
 69
 70
 71/// Wrap a type so that it can be accessed via ::type.
 72
 73template <typename T, typename ReasonT>
 74struct As_type_reason
 75{
 76  typedef T       type;
 77  typedef ReasonT reason_type;
 78};
 79
 80
 81
 82/// Check if two Pack_types are
 83///  (a) both Stride_unit_align, and
 84///  (b) have the same alignment.
 85
 86template <typename PackType1,
 87	  typename PackType2>
 88struct CA_Equal_stride_unit_align
 89{
 90  static bool const value = false;
 91};
 92
 93template <unsigned Align>
 94struct CA_Equal_stride_unit_align<Stride_unit_align<Align>, Stride_unit_align<Align> >
 95{
 96  static bool const value = true;
 97};
 98
 99
100
101// Reason tags.
102
103struct CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_unknown_stride_ok;
104struct CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_unit_stride_ok;
105struct CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_unit_stride_dense_ok;
106struct CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_unit_stride_align_ok;
107struct CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_different_stride;
108struct CA_Eq_cmplx_different_dim_order_but_both_dense;
109struct CA_Eq_cmplx_different_dim_order;
110struct CA_General_different_complex_layout;
111
112
113
114template <typename       Demotion,
115	  typename       Pack1,
116	  typename       Pack2>
117struct CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order
118{
119  typedef CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_unknown_stride_ok    reason1_type;
120  typedef CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_unit_stride_ok       reason2_type;
121  typedef CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_unit_stride_dense_ok reason3_type;
122  typedef CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_unit_stride_align_ok reason4_type;
123  typedef CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order_different_stride     reason5_type;
124
125  typedef typename Demotion::direct_type  direct_type;
126  typedef typename Demotion::reorder_type reorder_type;
127  typedef typename Demotion::flex_type    flex_type;
128
129  typedef 
130  ITE_type_reason<Type_equal<Pack2, Stride_unknown>::value,
131	As_type_reason<direct_type, reason1_type>,
132
133  ITE_type_reason< Type_equal<Pack2, Stride_unit>::value &&
134                  !Type_equal<Pack1, Stride_unknown>::value,
135	As_type_reason<direct_type, reason2_type>,
136
137  ITE_type_reason<Type_equal<Pack2, Stride_unit_dense>::value &&
138                  Type_equal<Pack1, Stride_unit_dense>::value,
139	As_type_reason<direct_type, reason3_type>,
140
141  ITE_type_reason<CA_Equal_stride_unit_align<Pack1, Pack2>::value,
142	As_type_reason<direct_type, reason4_type>,
143
144	As_type_reason<flex_type, reason5_type> > > > > ite_type;
145
146  typedef typename ite_type::type        type;
147  typedef typename ite_type::reason_type reason_type;
148};
149
150
151template <typename       Demotion,
152	  typename       Order1,
153	  typename       Pack1,
154	  typename       Order2,
155	  typename       Pack2>
156struct CA_Eq_cmplx
157{
158  typedef CA_Eq_cmplx_different_dim_order_but_both_dense reason1_type;
159  typedef CA_Eq_cmplx_different_dim_order                reason2_type;
160
161  typedef typename Demotion::reorder_type reorder_type;
162  typedef typename Demotion::flex_type    flex_type;
163
164  // If layouts have different dimension-ordering, then
165  //   reorder access if they are both dense,
166  //   copy access    otherwise
167  typedef 
168          ITE_type_reason<Type_equal<Order1, Order2>::value,
169		CA_Eq_cmplx_eq_order<Demotion, Pack1, Pack2>,
170		ITE_type_reason<Type_equal<Pack1, Stride_unit_dense>::value &&
171                                Type_equal<Pack2, Stride_unit_dense>::value,
172                        As_type_reason<reorder_type, reason1_type>,
173			As_type_reason<flex_type, reason2_type>
174                        >
175                > ite_type;
176
177  typedef typename ite_type::type        type;
178  typedef typename ite_type::reason_type reason_type;
179};
180
181
182
183template <typename       Demotion,
184	  typename       Order1,
185	  typename       Pack1,
186	  typename       Cmplx1,
187	  typename       Order2,
188	  typename       Pack2,
189	  typename       Cmplx2>
190struct CA_General
191{
192  typedef CA_General_different_complex_layout my_reason_type;
193
194  // If layouts do not have same complex layout, then copy access
195  typedef
196          ITE_type_reason<Type_equal<Cmplx1, Cmplx2>::value,
197			  CA_Eq_cmplx<Demotion, Order1, Pack1, Order2, Pack2>,
198			  As_type_reason<typename Demotion::copy_type,
199					 my_reason_type> >
200		ite_type;
201
202  typedef typename ite_type::type        type;
203  typedef typename ite_type::reason_type reason_type;
204};
205
